attributes.action: bring back the death penalty for child killers and other killers
attributes.additional_details:
I am aware great Britain have moved on from curtain death penalties which would now be considered out dated, However The lethal in injection or electric chair is being spoken among the British public.
The British pubic cant even be kept safe by life sentence meaning life! So these criminals would NEVER be able to offend and would give a serious thought in the back of any persons mind of ever offending knowing that they would never get away with it.  Within the last year alone from 2012 till now we have had two horrific evil sick minded men commit  the most horrific crimes and of both to admitted (yes I believe I did it) but cant remember i.e. mark Bridger and Stewart hazel in both cases which has stood up and admitted (yes iv done it). Is this not proof enough lets act now before its to LATE
